channel.title: [FIXED] Music still plays at Game volume when Music volume is set to 0
channel.description:
I set my Music volume to 0 so I could listen to Spotify while playing (heresy, I know)
The blast pit music came on at full volume anyway (this was on the return trip from one of the areas, I think it was the power generator)

item.title: [FIXED] Music still plays at Game volume when Music volume is set to 0
item.dc:creator: Maki
item.description:
Cool, already did that.

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED] Music still plays at Game volume when Music volume is set to 0
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Just needs #* or *# at the start of the path for the ambient_generic IE “#*music/bms - mscl_ambience3.ogg”

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED] Music still plays at Game volume when Music volume is set to 0

item.title: [FIXED] Music still plays at Game volume when Music volume is set to 0
item.dc:creator: Maki
item.description:
Is it fixed in a way that means that music ambient_generics need to point to a different location, or is it handled programmatically behind-the-scenes?

Read full topic
item.source: [FIXED] Music still plays at Game volume when Music volume is set to 0

item.title: [FIXED] Music still plays at Game volume when Music volume is set to 0
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
This would appear to be apparent in several other instances too. caused by a minor error in the file path for the music sound entities causing it too not recognise them as music but instead as generic audio.

Fixed for a future patch.

Read full topic
